DOC.criteria: Key Healthy male Aged 50 65 year ( inclusive ) Normal weight define body mass index ( BMI ) > 18.5 < 32.0 kg/m2 Weight 55 100 kg ( inclusive ) Adequate method contraception study period 6 month study drug administration Key exclusion Criteria : Evidence clinically significant disease Intake medication could affect outcome study Known hypersensitivity active substance excipients drug serious adverse reaction serious hypersensitivity drug formulation excipients History anaphylactic/anaphylactoid reaction Clinically significant abnormal biochemistry , haematology urinalysis Current history drug alcohol abuse past 2 year Regular alcohol consumption > 21 unit per week ( 1 unit = Â½ pint beer , 25 mL 40 % spirit 125 mL glass wine ) Current use use within last 12 month nicotine product Positive drug abuse test result Positive hepatitis B surface antigen , hepatitis C virus antibody human immunodeficiency virus result Presence history clinically significant allergy require treatment
